title: A plaine or moste true report of a daungerous seruice stoutely attempted, and manfully brought to passe by English men, Scottes men, Wallons & other worthy soldiours, for the takying of Macklin on the sodaine, a strong citee in Flaunders: sette forthe at large with speciall pointes to bee noted: by Thomas Churchyard gentleman. 1580.
author: Churchyard, Thomas, 1520?-1604.
publisher: By [Felix Kingston for] Ihon Perin, dwellyng in Paules Churchyarde, at the signe of the Angell,
